cast.name: 索伦·克拉格·雅格布森 Søren Kragh-Jacobsen
克里斯蒂安·莱沃 Kristian Levring
托马斯·温特伯格 Thomas Vinterberg
拉斯·冯·提尔 Lars von Trier

playdate: 2003-04-19(中国香港Hong Kong International Film Festival)
introduction: The filmmakers who created the Dogme Manifesto reflect, argue, and watch clips of their own films.Filmed during the course of a day long meeting between Dogme adherents Lars Von Trier, Soren Kragh-Jacobsen, Thomas Vinterberg, and Kristian Levring, the film isn't afraid of confronting the contradictions and flaws of the Dogme manifesto. Levring has the most insightful comments, and it's clear that Vinterberg was most comfortable with stretching the rules. Vinterberg's Festen scenarist Mogens Rukov is also around with some interesting thoughts.
